subject: New store review (2★) for SIMSONN (from Wayne R.)
description_text: You have a new 2-star review of SIMSONN from Wayne Readshaw w.readshaw@blackfinch.com Wayne Readshaw Display name: Wayne R. Ordered pedals and haptics. Haptics turned up but no pedals. All comms suggested the order had been fulfilled and no response from Simsonn when I follow up. Had to lodge a dispute with my credit card company before Simsonn acknowledged my they’d not sent the pedals. I eventually got them but after five minutes, the haptic motors stopped working.
